H0.text: Pen, paper, and a computer are the best set of tools to use for dissecting in a biology lab.

H1.text: Scissors, forceps, and a scalpel are the best set of tools to use for dissecting in a biology lab.

H2.text: Petri dish, flask, and a Bunsen burner are the best set of tools to use for dissecting in a biology lab.

H3.text: Glass slides, dye, and a light microscope are the best tools to use for dissecting in a biology lab.
